mean_cn: adj. 有缺陷的，不足的，不充足的
mean_en: not having enough of something that is important or necessary
word_etyma: de 否定+ fici =make,do,表示“做，制作”+ ent ...的 →向下做→ adj.缺乏的, 不足的, 不完善的
sentence: Although blind people are deficient of sight, they have extra sensitive hearing.
sentence_trans: 失明者在视觉上有缺陷，但他们在听觉上却更加敏感。
